name: Excel Partners
overview: As of May 2005, Excel Partners, S.A. was acquired by Coller Capital Ltd. Excel Partners S.A. is a private equity firm specializing in investments in medium sized companies. The firm seeks to invest in management buyouts, management buyin, buy and build, reorganizations, spin offs, divestment, expansions, and joint ventures. It prefers to invest in entire range of industry and services. The firm does not invest in mining, finance, and real estate. The firm targets companies based in the Latin America, Portugal, and Spain. It typically invests between Ð‚10 million ($ 12.52 million) and Ð‚50 million ($62.60 million) in its portfolio companies. Within management buyouts and management buyin, the firm seeks to invest in companies with the turnover between Ð‚25 million ($31.30 million) and Ð‚500($626.08 million). It prefers to be a lead investor and acquires minority stakes in its portfolio companies. Excel Partners S.A. was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Madrid, Spain.
